articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Azerbaijani Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Azerbaijani Ambassador
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Latif Gandilov, Azerbaijani ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.

articles.title: Britain's Decision to Dispatch Its Fighters to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drill against DPRK Blasted
articles.content:
Britain's Decision to Dispatch Its Fighters to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drill against DPRK Blasted
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Friday as regards the fact that Britain is going to let its fighters take part in the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises:
					 Britain reportedly decided to dispatch its fighters to the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills due in south Korea from upcoming November 4 to 10.
					
					 This is a hostile act of openly joining the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces in the moves for a new war against the DPRK.
					
					 At a time when the situation on the Korean peninsula is inching close to the brink of a war due to the ceaseless military exercises under various codenames staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces, Britain decided to take part in the above-said saber-rattling. This is a never-to-be pardoned serious challenge to peace and security. 
					
					 Britain claims that its fighters' participation in the military exercises is not targeted at the DPRK but the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces who are chiefly to blame for escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula openly bluster that the exercises are aimed to mount a strike at the military facilities and the command of the DPRK.
					
					 Britain which forged diplomatic relations with the DPRK on the principle of mutual respect for sovereignty is joining in the anti-DPRK moves of the hostile forces. This can never be overlooked.
					
					 Under the prevailing situation no one can vouch that the military drills would not spill over into an actual war.  It is clear, therefore, that all the military means and equipment to be involved in the drills will be put within the sight of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Britain should draw a serious lesson from its past in which it dispatched troops to the Korean war only to suffer huge losses of its own citizens and it took part in the U.S.-led "regime change" operation against Iraq and other countries only to bring an unprecedented whirlwind of terrorism and refugee crisis to Europe as a whole, and immediately withdraw its decision to take part in the military drills for aggression.

articles.title: Spokesman for C.C., Journalists Union of Korea Slams S. Korean Conservative Media's Smear Campaign against DPRK
articles.content:
Spokesman for C.C., Journalists Union of Korea Slams S. Korean Conservative Media's Smear Campaign against DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Journalists Union of Korea released a statement Friday slamming the south Korean conservative media for getting desperate to tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK, spreading wild rumors about it pursuant to the Park Geun Hye group of traitors' campaign to escalate the confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					 Yonhap News, KBS, Dong-A Ilbo and other conservative media of south Korea, echoing the anti-DPRK invectives spouted by the Park group keen on confrontation with the compatriots in the north, are busy with false propaganda about the non-existent "human rights issue" in the DPRK, discarding their original mission as media, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Being mouthpieces of the Park group, they are spreading misinformation provided by the puppet Intelligence Service and the Ministry of Unification. They are frantically inciting confrontation with the compatriots in the north with all sorts of lies and fabrications, deceiving the people and swimming against the trend of the times towards reunification.
					
					 Their smear campaign is just the last-ditch attempt of those displeased with everything going well in the DPRK and taken aback by its ever-increasing might. It, therefore, does not deserve even a passing note.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK are now dashing ahead like the wind to build a socialist power, frustrating the enemies' persistent sanctions and blockade to stifle the DPRK through an all-out drive for creation in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development-first principle.
					
					 Reptile media like Yonhap News, KBS and Dong-A Ilbo are shutting eyes to the stirring reality in the DPRK and keen on red herrings, quoting "news from the spot" and " new from overseas compatriots" which lack sources and are baseless in a bid to make information spread by them sound plausible.
					
					 Today the north-south ties have been pushed to the lowest ebb and the distrust and hostility between the north and the south have reached an extreme phase. The conservative media are also accountable for this situation as they have echoed the reckless remarks of the confrontation maniac of Chongwadae.
					
					 Taking this opportunity, we once again strongly warn the puppet media organizations including Yonhap News, KBS and Dong-A Ilbo against taking the lead in the anti-DPRK smear campaign.
					
					 The conservative media organizations and die-hard pseudo-journalists have no future and will have to pay dearly for the sins they committed by rubbing salt in the wounds of the compatriots, pursuant to Park's policy of confrontation with the DPRK under this grave situation.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Regime Should Be Thrown into Grave of History: Spokesman for C.C., DFRK
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Regime Should Be Thrown into Grave of History: Spokesman for C.C., DFRK
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea (DFRK) released a statement Friday as regards the strong waves of public actions sweeping south Korea to put an end to the Park Geun Hye regime's hideous rule of treachery.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Federation of Public Industrial Workers Unions of south Korea launched a strike on September 22 in protest against the regime's introduction of the system of paying wages according to piece rate. This was followed by a large-scale general strike launched by more than 100 trade unions and hundreds of thousands of workers in various parts of south Korea including Seoul, Pusan and Inchon in protest against traitor Park's evil labor policy.
					
					 They included the financial workers trade union, the railway workers trade union, the Seoul subway workers trade union, the health workers trade union under the Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of Trade Unions.
					
					 On September 24, 10,000 citizens in Kimchon City, North Kyongsang Province held a meeting in demand of the retraction of the decision to deploy THAAD in south Korea. Dozens of civic and religious bodies including the Kimchon No-THAAD Struggle Committee and the Action for Checking THAAD Deployment are staging strenuous No-THAAD actions in various parts of south Korea including Songju County chosen for the deployment and Kimchon City adjacent to it.
					
					 At least 1 140 "businesses involved in cooperation with the north"  including the emergency measure committee of businesses for south-north economic cooperation held a large-scale meeting and launched a 100-day over-night sit-in strike in front of the "government" building in Seoul on the occasion of the anniversary of the October 4 declaration. They blamed Park Geun Hye for plunging the south-north ties to the worst deadlock, asserting they would stage a death-defying struggle rain or shine until the day when the south-north economic cooperation will be resumed.
					
					 This mass struggle is rapidly spreading to the whole south Korean society including workers, scholars, religionists and politicians amid the rising voices of people from all walks of life demanding the introduction of a special investigation to probe the truth behind the death of peasant Paek Nam Gi and the modification of law to extend the period of activities of the Ad Hoc Committee for Probing the Truth behind the Ferry Sewol Disaster.
					
					 This is the eruption of the pent-up grudge and wrath of the popular masses against the Park regime that turned south Korea into a tundra of democracy, human rights and people's livelihood and is bringing the disaster of a nuclear war to the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The Park regime is just the group of the most wicked traitors who turned south Korea into a veritable hell, a grave of human rights and hotbed of a nuclear war by adding to the unpardonable thrice-cursed crimes already committed by it.
					
					 It is quite natural for south Koreans of various circles to turn out with towering indignation in the actions against the regime's misrule, sycophancy, heinous policy of confrontation with the compatriots in the north and moves for a nuclear war against the north.
					
					 The Park regime should stop at once its anachronistic fascist suppression and step down as wanted by the trend of the times and the public.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of "A Just Russia"
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of "A Just Russia"
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from S. M. Mironov, chairman of "A Just Russia", on Oct. 4.
					 The chairman in the message extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to all the Korean people on the occasion of the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the significant day, on behalf of "A Just Russia" and on his own behalf.
					
					 The WPK, founded on Oct. 10, 1945 has become a guiding force of Korea's society and it assumes a high sense of responsibility for the future of the country and citizens today, the message said, adding:
					
					 It is natural that the Korean people, diligent and resourceful, are enjoying a peaceful life in a friendly manner with countries around the Korean peninsula in their developed and modern socialist country.
					
					 It is fundamental for future prosperity of the DPRK to ensure the durable peace and stability and stable development of the region.
					
					 The message expressed expectation that the WPK would make proactive efforts to solve these problems at an early date.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un and all the Korean people peace and prosperity and big successes in building a socialist state.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a message of greeting from N. Enkhbayar, chairman of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party, on Oct. 7.
					 The chairman in the message extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un and all members of the WPK on the 71st anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the friendly relations between the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party and the WPK would grow stronger, thus making a great contribution to deepening the friendship between the two countries and two peoples.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un bigger successes in his work to strengthen the party and achieve the country's prosperity and good health and happiness.

articles.title: 70th Anniversary of Hamhung University of Medicine Marked
articles.content:
70th Anniversary of Hamhung University of Medicine Marked
 Hamhung, October 14 (KCNA) -- Hamhung University of Medicine marked its 70th founding anniversary.
					 The university is the nation's well-known center for training medical talents as it has greatly contributed to demonstrating the advantages of the socialist healthcare system and developing the Juche-oriented medical science. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung established the nation's first medical college in Hamhung City on October 15, Juche 35 (1946).
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il gave instructions to train a lot of able physicians by improving the quality of teaching as required by the mission of the university and showed such loving care as making sure that an e-library was built.
					
					 A meeting took place on Friday to mark the anniversary.

articles.title: DPRK Team Qualified to Advance into Semifinals of 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Team Qualified to Advance into Semifinals of 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team advanced into semifinals of the 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup.
					 It tied England 3:3 and trounced its Brazilian and Nigerian rivals 1:0 and 3:0 in league matches respectively to advance into the quarterfinals as the winner in Group C. 
					
					 It beat its Ghanaian rival from Group D 2:1 on October 13.
					
					 It will play semifinals with its Venezuelan rival on Oct. 17.

articles.title: Emulation Movement Brisk in Railway Sector
articles.content:
Emulation Movement Brisk in Railway Sector
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A socialist emulation movement was launched at the Ministry of Railways in the DPRK to carry by rail more building and other materials to the flood-hit northern part of the country.
					 According to data available at the ministry, freight traffic to the disaster areas per day went up 1.5 times that before the start of emulation movement.
					
					 As of October 11, the ministry was transporting 91.9 percent of the total amount of cement needed for the flood damage rehabilitation.
					
					 Taking part in the movement are Pyongyang, Hamhung and Chongjin railway bureaus under the ministry.

articles.title: Assistance to Disaster Areas in DPRK
articles.content:
Assistance to Disaster Areas in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A drive is gaining momentum in the DPRK to render assistance to the flood-hit northern part of the country.
					 Taking the lead in the drive are North Phyongan and Kangwon provinces.
					
					 Until now, North Phyongan Province has sent tens of wagons carrying window frames, electric wire, water pipes and other materials.
					
					 In Kangwon Province, many units and inhabitants provided a large amount of food, clothes and consumer goods.
					
					 And various industrial establishments turned out in the production of cement, plastic tubes and other materials to be needed for flood damage rehabilitation.
					
					 The Wonsan Glass Bottle Factory produced 100,000 more glass bowls for inhabitants in the disaster areas.

articles.title: Results of Housing Construction in Disaster Areas
articles.content:
Results of Housing Construction in Disaster Areas
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A roofing work for 100 flats was finished in the township of Kyonghung County, one of the flood-hit areas in North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK, on October 11.
					 The soldier-builders carried out the foundation work and framework by the end of September before starting the interior and exterior plastering, floor concrete temping and roofing work.
					
					 They are now carrying on the floor plastering and tile-setting of flats and the rezoning of their vicinity.

articles.title: Iron and Steel Production Goes up in DPRK
articles.content:
Iron and Steel Production Goes up in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Metal industrial establishments of the DPRK have turned out in a drive for increased production to supply more steel materials to the recovery efforts in flood-hit North Hamgyong Province.
					 The Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex already carried out its pig iron production plan for the restoration of railways and is producing much amount of square steel every day.
					
					 The Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex raised the production of heavy rails and bar steel by ensuring the normal operation of oxygen heat blast furnace and UHP electric arc furnace.
					
					 The Chongjin Steel Factory, too, is now turning out much more steel than planned every day. It carried out its September production plan in 10-odd days.

articles.title: Poster Celebrating 90th Anniversary of DIU Issued
articles.content:
Poster Celebrating 90th Anniversary of DIU Issued
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House produced a poster to mark the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 The poster depicting Mt. Paektu and its thick forest and the flag of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) bears the abbreviation of the union (DIU), the historical root of the WPK, and letters "October 17, Juche 15 (1926)," "90th Anniversary" and "Celebration."

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Reveals Ulterior Aim Sought by Park Geun Hye in Racket over "Security Crisis"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Reveals Ulterior Aim Sought by Park Geun Hye in Racket over "Security Crisis"
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group have been busy with an unprecedented anti-DPRK racket over "security crisis" since the DPRK's nuclear warhead explosion test.
					 They held "an emergency meeting to examine security situation" and "state council meeting" almost every day at which they let out a stream of jargons about "situation as serious as emergency" and "the north's likelihood to launch terrorism in the rear of south Korea" and "possible outbreak of a war on the Korean peninsula" in a desperate bid to deliberately stir up horror throughout the south Korean society.
					
					 Of late they deliberately floated the story about "the planned attack on the north in the first half of next year" in a bid to get on its nerves.
					
					 It goes without saying that this is motivated by the purpose to rally the conservative forces, ensure a stable rule in the closing period of office and make the "Saenuri Party" stay in power.
					
					 It is well known that whenever the group were in the grip of the extreme ruling crisis, they trumpeted about "the north's threat" and "the security crisis" in an effort to tide over the crisis. 
					
					 The Park group never forgot to cite "the north's threat" whenever it was driven into a tight corner. To give just a few examples, they concocted the fiction about the north's "March 20 hacking attack" and purchased active anthrax germs, stunning the world, but they spread the story of "the north's threat to spread active anthrax germs.
					
					 The Park regime is going so busy with the row over "threat of the north's nukes" because its ruling crisis has reached an uncontrollable phase.
					
					 She has come under fire by public for bringing the south Korean economy to a bankruptcy, throwing the people's living into destitution and pushing the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse for just a little over three years.
					
					 The anti-"government" actions being staged by people from all walks of life almost every day and power-backed scandals being disclosed from among Park's confidants and relatives are driving her regime into the abyss of ruin.
					
					 Much upset by this, Park and her cohorts are working hard to create favorable conditions for staying in power by rallying disunited conservative forces and propping up the ruling foundation through the racket over "security crisis".
					
					 The conservatives are spouting a stream of such vituperation against the DPRK as they "should be determined to bring down the north's regime," rendering the situation on the peninsula tenser than ever before.
					
					 Such security hysteria would get the puppet group nowhere and they are only fated to suffer a horrible disaster.
					
					 The south Korean people from all walks of life should be vigilant against the conservative regime, well aware of its crafty artifice, and turn out in the campaign to throw overboard Park, a big trouble maker.

articles.title: Chongwadae Denounced for Violating Democracy
articles.content:
Chongwadae Denounced for Violating Democracy
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The floor leader of the Minju Party of south Korea at a meeting for measures demanded U Pyong U, chief secretary for civilian administration of the puppet Chongwadae, appear in parliamentary inspection of the administration for his scandals, according to the south Korean MBC on October 11.
					 Saying that Chongwadae groundlessly declared it cannot let U Pyong U appear in the inspection, the floor leader denounced it as violation of democracy.
					
					 He urged U Pyong U to appear in the inspection of the administration scheduled on October 21 without fail.

articles.title: Art Performance for Reunification Given by Korean Youth, Students in Japan
articles.content:
Art Performance for Reunification Given by Korean Youth, Students in Japan
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- An art performance for reunification "Reunification with Songs" was given by Korean youth and students in Japan at the Education Hall of Japan in Tokyo on October 10 to mark the ninth anniversary of the publication of the historic October 4 declaration under the sponsorship of the Council of Youth and Students of the Japanese Regional Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.
					 Prior to the performance speakers called upon the Korean youth and students to vigorously usher in the second June 15 era under the unfurled banner of the October 4 declaration by inheriting the spirit and tradition of the preceding generation.
					
					 Put on the stage were chorus "Our Banner," piano play "Korea Is One" and other colorful numbers. 
					
					 An appeal to youth and students in the north and the south was read out.
					
					 It called upon the youth and students in the north, the south and abroad to become the standard-bearers and vanguard displaying the second enthusiasm for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration for peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Delegations, Personages of Different Countries Visit DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Delegations, Personages of Different Countries Visit DPRK Embassies
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Delegations of political parties, organizations and institutions and personages of different countries paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK embassies in relevant countries from September 28 to October 8 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 71st founding anniversary of the WPK and the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 They included the Uganda National Resistance Movement, Uganda People's Congress, Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement, Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Makerere University of Uganda, Lumumbist National Movement of DR Congo, Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist), Nepalese National Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il, Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal, Nepal Literary Forum for the Study of Songun Policy, a newspaper office of Cambodia, Myanmar Medical Research Institute, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist), secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party, president of the Bangladesh People's League, chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea and the director of the Central Secretariat of the Pakistan People's Party.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and full-length picture of them standing together.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Commission for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam and the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar sent floral baskets to the DPRK embassies in their countries on Oct. 7 and 10.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Speech at 9th Congress of Youth League Introduced in Hungary
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Speech at 9th Congress of Youth League Introduced in Hungary
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- "Let Us Usher in a Golden Age of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth Movement", the speech made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the Ninth Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, was introduced by the Hungarian Workers' Party in the newspaper Szabadsag and a website on October 7 on the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report to 7th Congress of WPK Introduced in Tanzania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report to 7th Congress of WPK Introduced in Tanzania
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The Tanzanian newspaper Uhuru on October 8 carried "3. For the Independent Reunification of the Country" of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee.
					 "3. For the Independent Reunification of the Country" reviewed the struggle of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) for accomplishing the cause of national reunification and successes achieved in the period under review.
					
					 It indicated the line of the WPK on national reunification and the policy of carrying it out and urgent problems arising in accomplishing the independent reunification of the country.
					
					 The newspaper carried a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: ACP Introduces DPRK's Idea of Foreign Policy
articles.content:
ACP Introduces DPRK's Idea of Foreign Policy
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Independence, peace and friendship are the DPRK's idea of foreign policy.
					 ACP (news agency of DR Congo) said this in an article posted on its website on Oct. 4.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 In this idea the DPRK government has worked hard to further strengthen the friendship and unity with the world people and build a new free and peaceful world.
					
					 It has also made efforts to break the old international economic order characterized by domination and dependence and establish new one based on equality, justice and impartiality and expand south-south cooperation.
					
					 The DPRK has forged diplomatic relations with many countries and conducted brisk economic and cultural exchange, consolidating the ties of friendship.
					
					 Voices supporting the reunification of the Korean peninsula are mounting higher in different countries as the days go by.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con embajador de Azerbaijan
articles.content:
Vocero del MINREX rechaza presencia britanica en simulacro EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 14 de octubre (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada el dia 14 en relacion con que Gran Bretana trata de enviar sus cazas al ejercicio militar conjunto EE.UU.-Sur de Corea, el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio la siguiente respuesta:
					Segun trascendidos, Gran Bretana decidio enviar sus cazas al ejercicio militar conjunto EE.UU.-Sur de Corea que se efectuara desde el dia 4 al 10 de noviembre en el territorio surcoreano.
					
					Esto deviene un acto hostil de incorporarse abiertamente en las maniobras de provocacion de nueva guerra de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Constituye un imperdonable desafio a la paz y seguridad la participacion britanica justamente cuando la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana llega al estado de tension a punto de explosion debido a los incesantes entrenamientos militares de toda indole de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Gran Bretana justifica su presencia diciendo que esta no apunta a la RPDC. Pero, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos, culpables principales de la agravacion de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, dicen abiertamente que ese simulacro es para ejercitar el golpe a las instalaciones militares y la comandancia de la RPDC.
					
					Jamas podemos pasar por alto que Gran Bretana se adhiriera a las maniobras anti-RPDC de las fuerzas hostiles violando el principio de respeto reciproco a la soberania, a base del cual se establecieron las relaciones estatales entre ambas partes.
					
					En la situacion actual no hay ninguna garantia de que el simulacro en cuestion no pasara a la guerra real. Por lo tanto, esta claro que todos los medios y equipos militares participantes se colocaran en la mira del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Gran Bretana debe cancelar de inmediato su participacion sacando serias lecciones de los antecedentes en que causo la muerte de sus incontables ciudadanos en la pasada guerra coreana y produjo la crisis del terrorismo y de refugiados sin precedentes en toda Europa al tomar parte en los actos de "derrocamiento de regimen" contra Irak y otros paises patrocinados por EE.UU.

articles.title: Vocero del MINREX rechaza presencia britanica en simulacro EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz del CC de UPC condena a los medios de prensa surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 14 de octubre (ACNC) -- El vocero del Comite Central de la Union de Periodistas de Corea hizo publica hoy una declaracion denunciando la conducta abominable de los medios conservadores de prensa surcoreana que se dedican a la demagogia encaminada a manchar la digna imagen de la RPDC sumandose a la brutal campana de enfrentamiento fratricida de la camarilla traidora de Park Geun-hye.
					Segun la nota, Yonhap News, KBS, Dong-A Ilbo y otros medios inventaron hasta el inexistente "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC repitiendo como papagayo los disparates y sofismas contra la parte connacional que dicen los compinches de Park y como si esto fuera poco, realizan ahora la propaganda intrigante en contra de la mision de la prensa.
					
					Como sirvientes files de la camarilla de Park, divulgan los datos sucios y absurdos que les suministran el Servicio de Inteligencia y el Ministerio de Unificacion por una parte y por la otra, agitan la confrontacion fratricida enganando a la opinion publica y desafiando a la corriente de la epoca hacia la reunificacion, senala el portavoz y continua:
					
					La chismografia de esos medios no pasa de ser un delirio de los disgustados de la buena marcha de cosas en la RPDC y el esfuerzo agonico de los atemorizados ante el creciente poderio de ella. 
					
					Ahora, el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos avanzan a todo galope hacia la cima de potencia socialista frustrando las persistentes maquinaciones de sancion, bloqueo y presion de las fuerzas hostiles con la gran batalla de creacion basada en el principio de autofortalecimiento.
					
					Haciendo vista gorda de esa realidad conmovedora, los referidos medios venales fabrican y circulan versiones falsas tratando de atribuirles credito con palabras como "fuentes locales" y "fuentes de compatriotas residentes en el extranjero" cuya direccion o existencia real se desconoce.
					
					La responsabilidad por la llegada de relaciones intercoreanas a la peor fase y por la creacion de desconfianza y hostilidad extremadas recae tambien sobre los medios conservadores que se dejan llevar por la inquilina diabolica de Chongwadae.
					
					En esta oportunidad, volvemos a advertir seriamente a los medios titeres como Yonhap News, KBS, Dong-A Ilbo que se ponen al frente de la demagogia anti-RPDC.
					
					No habra el futuro para ellos y los connotados periodistas, que dejan heridas imborrables a los compatriotas tomando parte activa en la campana conflictiva anti-RPDC de Park, y este crimen sera liquidado sin falta.

articles.title: Portavoz del CC de UPC condena a los medios de prensa surcoreanos
articles.content:
FDRP insiste en sepultar el "poder" de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 14 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que en toda la sociedad surcoreana se dinamiza la lucha masiva para acabar con la dominacion vendepatria de la banda de Park Geun-hye, el portavoz del Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria (FDRP) hizo publica el dia 14 una declaracion que sigue:
					　El 22 de septiembre, la Federacion Nacional de los Sindicatos Industriales Publicos del Sur de Corea entro en la huelga contra la aplicacion del sistema de salario anual para los ameritados. El paro general se extendio en breve a distintas partes surcoreanas como Seul, Pusan e Inchon con la participacion de mas de 100 sindicatos adscritos a la Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos y la Federacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos y cientos de miles de obreros que protestan la politica laboral antipopular de la traidora Park Geun-hye. 
					
					　Por otra parte, tuvo lugar el dia 24 en la ciudad de Kimchon de la provincia de Kyongsang del Norte el mitin de juramento de diez mil ciudadanos para demandar la cancelacion de la decision de emplazamiento de THAAD. Y el comite de lucha de Kimchon contra la ubicacion de THAAD, la accion nacional para la detencion del despliegue de THAAD y otras decenas de entidades civiles y religiosas desarrollan incesantemente la lucha contra el despliegue de ese armamento mortifero en el distrito de Songju, fijado como lugar de colocacion, la contigua ciudad de Kimchon y otras localidades.
					
					　En particular, con motivo del dia de publicacion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, el comite de medidas emergentes de la empresa de cooperacion economica Sur-Norte y otras mas de mil 140 "empresas de cooperacion con el Norte de Corea" organizaron ante el edificio del "gobierno" de Seul un mitin de gran dimension.
					
					　En esa ocasion, iniciaron una huelga de 100 dias despues de lamentar que Park Geun-hye llevo a la peor fase las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y jurar que lucharian a muerte hasta cuando se reanude la cooperacion economica Sur-Norte.
					
					　La presente lucha masiva se extiende a todos los dominios sociales como trabajo, ciencia, religion, politica, etc. en medio de que se alzan las voces de distintos estratos que exigen la aplicacion de la inspeccion especial sobre la averiguacion del verdadero aspecto de la muerte del campesino Paek Nam Gi, la enmienda de la ley para la prolongacion del plazo de trabajo de la comision de investigacion especial sobre la tragedia del ferry "Sewol" y otros. 
					
					　Esto es una explosion de la indignacion de las masas populares contra la banda de Park que convirtio el Sur de Corea en un lugar infernal para la democracia, DDHH y la vida del pueblo y busca los desastres de guerra nuclear a la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					　Es muy natural que toda la poblacion surcoreana luche contra las politicas antipopulares, las maniobras serviles a grandes potencias, la confrontacion fratricida y la politica de guerra nuclear de agresion al Norte de Corea de los compinches de Park.
					
					　Al ver bien la tendencia de la epoca y la demanda del pueblo, la camarilla de Park debe cesar de inmediato la anacronica represion fascista y retirarse del poder.
